title: BRIEF-Namaste's Cannmart Secures Order From Province Of British Columbia
text:
BRIEF-Namaste's Cannmart Secures Order From Province Of British Columbia

Stock Markets 5 minutes ago (Sep 16, 2019 09:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Namaste's Cannmart Secures Order From Province Of British Columbia Sept 16 (Reuters) - Namaste Technologies Inc : * NAMASTE'S CANNMART SECURES ORDER FROM PROVINCE OF BRITISH COLUMBIA * NAMASTE TECHNOLOGIES - RECEIVED PURCHASE ORDER FOR PRE-ROLLED CANNABIS PRODUCTS FROM BC LIQUOR DISTRIBUTION BRANCH TO CATER TO BRITISH COLUMBIA

BRIEF-Namaste's Cannmart Secures Order From Province Of British Columbia
